programme.desc: Hoping to finally find out the whereabouts of her long-lost brother, Misty challenges Akiza to a Shadow Duel in a maze of mirrors.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: After unlocking Akiza's psychic powers, Sayer sets his sights on using them to get even with the Dark Signers for destroying the Arcadia Movement.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei, Jack and Crow face off against Goodwin in the ultimate Shadow Duel showdown.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With the safety of the world hanging in the balance, Yusei, Jack and Crow look to tip the scales in their favor by setting their sights on Goodwin's Earthbound Immortal.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points running on empty, Yusei looks to rev it up one last time in order to defeat Goodwin and save the world from the destructive powers of the King of the Netherworld!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious new threat arrives on the scene in New Domino City, forcing Yusei to take to the streets and track down a rogue Turbo Duelist known as The Ghost.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: With his life points on the line, Yusei must figure out a way to take down Ghost's Meklord Emperor Wisel before Wisel's special ability throws his game and his runner into a tailspin.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Vice Chancellor Rudolph Heitmann threatens to expel all the members of Leo and Luna's class from Duel Academy, Yusei attempts to teach the teacher a valuable lesson by challenging the Vice Chancellor to a duel to keep his friends in school.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When a loan shark starts sinking his teeth into New Domino City, Jack decides to reel in this money-grubbing menace for good by putting his most prized possessions on the line in a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: When Leo and Luna decide to go exploring a nearby forest rumored to be haunted by wicked spirits, they soon discover that the rumors are all too real when a mysterious boy traps Luna in his house and challenges Leo to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Yusei wakes up to find himself trapped in the back of a big rig with a bump on his head and no way out. After a mysterious tip leads Akiza to Yusei's location, the two friends soon find themselves Turbo Dueling an unfamiliar foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Sherry races on, Sherry reveals some shocking secrets about the upcoming World Racing Grand Prix. Meanwhile, Akiza begins to gain a new understanding and appreciation for Turbo Dueling while riding shotgun to Yusei.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Before heading out to the event of the year - The World Racing Grand Prix Gala - Yusei challenges Jack to a Turbo Duel in the hopes of finding a new dueling strategy that doesn't involve the use of Synchro Monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: A mysterious duelist named Vizor offers to show Yusei a new dueling strategy known as The Synchro Solution.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
programme.desc: Akiza goes to get her Turbo Dueling license, but before she can drive off into the sunset, she first has to out-duel, out-maneuver and out-smart one of Sector Security's finest for her final exam.

programme.title: The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people: Survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Bounce-man's power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy's Life!

programme.title: With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats' allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: As Long as We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!

programme.title: Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry's powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!

programme.title: Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy's King Kong Gun of Anger!

programme.title: With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they've endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace's final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitora’s Surprising Decision!

programme.title: Repercussions of Doflamingo's defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora's actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sending a Shock Wave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!

programme.title: The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!

programme.title: Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy's favor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Brothers' Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo's Reunion!

programme.title: As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors - Kaido, King of the Beasts!

programme.title: As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Fujitora's flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!

programme.title: Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy's lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!

programme.title: Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Men's Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!

programme.title: The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora's strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora's Ruthless Pursuit!

programme.title: With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sons' Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet is Formed!

programme.title: While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World

programme.title: While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy's appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto's Great Adventure!

programme.title: The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill's group hides a terrible secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!

programme.title: Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill's assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!

programme.title: Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill's self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!

programme.title: Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!

programme.title: Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard's Son Appears!

programme.title: Finally scaling the elephant's back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!

programme.title: Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant's back, but he's treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!

programme.title: Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences… And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!

programme.title: Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy's loose lips get them into trouble!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!

programme.title: Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!

programme.title: Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack's amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is invited by both Fujiko and Rebecca to a couples-only wine auction party. Both women have their sights on the same thing: The Lovesick Pig, a legendary wine appearing in the auction.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca is kidnapped and Lupin must rescue her! Before she was kidnapped, Rebecca had been deciphering a book left behind by a genius scientist, and MI6 made the mysterious comment that it was the "Dream of Italy."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin finally deciphers the book left behind by the genius scientist Uraga, and then mysteriously falls asleep. He ends up in a world where it's impossible to tell whether what he sees is a dream or reality. Is this the "Dream of Italy"?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has been arrested and imprisoned. He's tried everything he could to escape, but Zenigata stops him every time. Zenigata then sends Lupin to an even higher-security prison, just to be on the safe side. Has the end of Lupin III has come at last?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin is so broke that he doesn't know what he'll eat tomorrow, so he concocts a plan to steal the Mona Lisa. But the Mona Lisa won't be easy to steal. He does his best to weave through the security net Zenigata has set.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Like a she-devil, the diamond "Cleopatra's Soul" is constantly changing owners. In search of the diamond, Lupin arrives at what appears to be an ordinary school...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin, Jigen, and Goemon decide to go eat some tasty sushi, but when they hop in the car to leave, they find a dog inside. Lupin promises to drop the dog off with Fujiko while they're out getting sushi.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.
programme.sub-title: I'm Going to Get You, Lupin

programme.title: Universal Soldier, (1992, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A woman reporter discovers a Defense Department project to create androids from the bodies of Vietnam soldiers, to be then used as an elite anti-terrorism unit.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: Timecop, (1994, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiancée, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: Deep Impact, (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When a couple of young astronomers discover an enormous comet on course to collide with Earth, the countdown to doomsday begins and the human race embarks on the fight for survival.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats, (1943, Western)
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: Flame Of Barbary Coast, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: A cowboy competes with a gambling tycoon on the Barbary Coast for the hand of a beautiful dance-hall queen.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: In Old California, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: McLintock!, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintock’s ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen O’Hara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman, (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Warlock, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: An ex-outlaw (Richard Widmark) divides and challenges a quick-draw lawman (Henry Fonda) and his sidekick (Anthony Quinn).

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: All the jackasses you love from the MTV series are back performing stunts no one would let them pull on television.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Prepare yourself for fits of uncontrollable laughter and waves of nausea as the guys launch their battered bodies into an onslaught of absurd situations.

programme.title: Jackass 3, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: The jackass guys are back, so brace yourself for unbelievable and totally explicit stunts from the idiots you've come to know and love from a safe and sanitary distance!

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville reprises his jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of an old man saddled with the care of his grandson. The two hustle their way across America on an outrageous road trip pranking unsuspecting, real-life people.

programme.title: Rick and the others determine that the only way to keep peace in Alexandria, is to wage a war with a new enemy.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: After a minor success, two members of the group are taken hostage; Carol struggles morally with the lengths she has gone to survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: To save one of their own, Rick's group must venture outside the walls; their experience changes their lives forever.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: As the members of the group remain helpless, Negan takes action that will forever haunt those who survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be

programme.title: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia.

programme.title: Street Flava
